MongoDB, Express, React, Nodejs Application. React with Redux used on the frontend. Node.js and Javascript running on an express server. REST API with full CRUD/LOGIN/LOGOUT capabilities. Feel free to make an account, and make some friends! Blogging website built with NodeJs, Express web framework and MongoDB noSQL Database. Full REST API with token authentication, routes, and EJS templates. Project is currently deployed to Heroku. However, Mongodb connection was deleted. Travel Startup Site built with HTML,CSS,SCSS, Javascript, and JQuery. Used Gulp to run auto-reload and used to compile code for deployment. Using Sprites to display SVG images. Mobile First Approach. Using BEM principles.
